DataElement.preferredName: Videothoracoscopy and Laparoscopy Surveillance Result Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The score related to suspicion of malignancy, including mesothelioma, as detected by surveillance videothoracoscopy and laparoscopy.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Videothoracoscopy And Laparoscopy Computed Tomography Imaging Mesothelioma Probability Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Endoscopic examination of the thoracic cavity, with a camera or similar device attached to an endoscope for viewing or recording the images generated during the procedure._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._A surgical procedure during which a laparoscope is inserted into the abdomen to view the abdominopelvic contents for diagnostic and/or therapeutic purposes._A prospective scoring system related to suspicion of malignancy, including mesothelioma, as measured by all modalities of computed tomographic imaging.

It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.:A surgical procedure during which a laparoscope is inserted into the abdomen to view the abdominopelvic contents for diagnostic and/or therapeutic purposes.

Concepts.definition: Endoscopic examination of the thoracic cavity, with a camera or similar device attached to an endoscope for viewing or recording the images generated during the procedure.
An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.
A surgical procedure during which a laparoscope is inserted into the abdomen to view the abdominopelvic contents for diagnostic and/or therapeutic purposes.

Property.preferredName: Computed Tomography Imaging Mesothelioma Probability Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A prospective scoring system related to suspicion of malignancy, including mesothelioma, as measured by all modalities of computed tomographic imaging.

Concepts.longName: Computed Tomography Imaging Mesothelioma Probability Score
Concepts.definition: A prospective scoring system related to suspicion of malignancy, including mesothelioma, as measured by all modalities of computed tomographic imaging.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for NCI-INC0521046 20C0106 new questions 9.16.20 mc

ValueDomain.preferredName: VATS and Laparoscopy Surveillance Result Score
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A score of 2A.1 that indicates abnormality with low suspicion for malignancy-mesothelioma, localized, as seen using video-assisted thoracoscopy and laparoscopy.

Concepts.definition: A score of 2A.1 that indicates abnormality with low suspicion for malignancy-mesothelioma, localized, as seen using video-assisted thoracoscopy and laparoscopy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A score of 2A.2 that indicates abnormality with low suspicion for malignancy-mesothelioma, diffuse, as seen using video-assisted thoracoscopy and laparoscopy.

Concepts.definition: A score of 2A.2 that indicates abnormality with low suspicion for malignancy-mesothelioma, diffuse, as seen using video-assisted thoracoscopy and laparoscopy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A score of 1B that indicates abnormality with malignancy not identified-other: (pleural plaque, etc.) as seen using video-assisted thoracoscopy and laparoscopy.

Concepts.definition: A score of 1B that indicates abnormality with malignancy not identified-other: (pleural plaque, etc.) as seen using video-assisted thoracoscopy and laparoscopy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A score of 1A that indicates abnormality with malignancy not identified-atypical mesothelial proliferation as seen using video-assisted thoracoscopy and laparoscopy.

Concepts.definition: A score of 1A that indicates abnormality with malignancy not identified-atypical mesothelial proliferation as seen using video-assisted thoracoscopy and laparoscopy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A score of 0 that indicates no abnormalities detected as seen using video-assisted thoracoscopy and laparoscopy.

Concepts.definition: A score of 0 that indicates no abnormalities detected as seen using video-assisted thoracoscop and laparoscopy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A score of 2B that indicates abnormality with low suspicion for malignancy-other neoplasm (specify) as seen using video-assisted thoracoscopy and laparoscopy.

Concepts.definition: A score of 2B that indicates abnormality with low suspicion for malignancy-other neoplasm (specify) as seen using video-assisted thoracoscopy and laparoscopy.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
